Name: Mainstay Inn
Description: Casual redbrick hotel offering simple rooms, plus free continental breakfast, parking & Wi-Fi.

Name: The Prussia Hotel, BW Signature Collection
Description: Laid-back budget hotel with a seasonal outdoor pool & a gym, plus free breakfast & parking.

Name: Residence Inn Philadelphia West Chester/Exton
Description: Contemporary extended-stay hotel offering an indoor pool, plus free Wi-Fi, hot breakfast & parking.

Name: Americas Best Value Inn Pottstown
Description: Complimentary breakfast & Wi-Fi at a low-key budget hotel with guest laundry, plus free parking.

Name: Valley Forge Casino Resort
Description: Casual casino hotel offering a spa, a seasonal outdoor pool & dining, plus 2 event venues.

Name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Downingtown Exton Route 30
Description: Bright studios & suites in a straightforward hotel with free breakfast, a gym & an indoor pool.

Name: Fairfield Inn Philadelphia West Chester/Exton
Description: Relaxed hotel with an indoor pool & fitness facilities, plus free Wi-Fi & hot breakfast.

Name: French Creek Inn
Description: Simple roadside hotel offering rooms with microwaves, fridges & TVs, plus free breakfast & parking.

Name: General Warren
Description: Traditional, old-world American eatery with a terrace & fireplace inside a historic boutique hotel.

Name: Duling-Kurtz House & Country Inn
Description: Country-style B&B in an 1830 building with antiques-filled rooms & suites, plus dining & a bar.

Name: Wayne Hotel
Description: Landmark hotel with classic rooms featuring free WiFi, continental breakfast & off-site gym access.

Name: Hyatt House Philadelphia/King of Prussia
Description: Unfussy quarters, some with kitchens, in a relaxed hotel offering a pool, a bar & free breakfast.

Name: Fairfield Inn Philadelphia Valley Forge/King of Prussia
Description: Straightforward hotel with free Wi-Fi, hot breakfast & parking, plus a fitness room.

Name: Courtyard Philadelphia Great Valley/Malvern
